response.original_title: ワンダリング・メモリア
response.overview: When Haruka learns that the housing complex where she spent her childhood is about to be demolished, she sets out on a nighttime walk through the complex with her live-in boyfriend, Natsuki. As they arrive at the now-desolate apartments, Haruka recalls a memory from long ago — seeing a ghost on the rooftop that was once off-limits. Nostalgic memories begin to vividly resurface, slowly blurring the line between past and present. A horror film from a director who also leads a theater troupe.
response.title: ワンダリング・メモリア
